item.title: SentinelDocs: A Privacy-First AI Document Analyst
item.description: Building a completely offline AI document analysis tool that respects privacy

item.title: Diffusion Policy: A Practical Guide to the Most Exciting New Approach in Robot Learning
item.description: A deep dive into Cheng Chi et al.'s Diffusion Policy: how it works, where it wins, what still hurts, and what the community is fixing next.

item.title: Why the Next AI Breakthrough Has to Move Atoms, Not Words
item.description: As AI masters language, the next frontier is physical intelligence - systems that can actually help in your home and daily life.

item.title: Why I Learned to Love Debugging (And Why You Should Too)
item.description: How debugging transformed my engineering approach and why it's the most valuable skill in an Vibe Coding world

item.title: Reinforcement learning (without neural networks)
item.description: A detailed introduction to reinforcement learning fundamentals without neural networks
